title: Silver player looking for q partners.
body:
Hi guys,

Im currently in Silver 2 dropped down from silver 1 (just bad games and other team was on point).

I main top Irelia, Trundle, Jarvan 4, Malphite, Moakai and Nautilus.
Occasionally play Adc Jinx, Miss fortune and Lucian.
I can play some mid lane Ekko but mainly top.

Basically just looking for players around silver to low gold to get together and play some games, have fun and work together for a higher rank.

Anyone who is keen to q up, i will be free Wednesday from 8am til 530pm and thursday from 1030am onwards.

IGN: Nickmate

replies.body:
I'm willing to duoQ, I'm silver 5 mainly because I main mid Azir. Why this is bad for me is that Azir needs his team to not play too aggressive early game and you can find out the reason. Not sure if you want to.

{{champion:268}}
